title: Sarah's Dirty Secret
description: -- This book contains graphic depictions of sexual activity including oral sex and masturbation. It is intended for mature audiences not offended by explicit representations of sexual activity between consenting adults.--Sarah has been married for ten years, and she couldn't be more bored. However, Sarah is keeping one little secret. She can't stop fantasizing about her sexy boss. -- Charlie moved slowly towards her, and she watched through a lust-filled haze as he brought her hand to his mouth, sucking the juices from her fingers. A drop of moisture rolled down her inner thigh in response, and she moaned aloud.
author: Charity Parkerson
